actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the maximum rate of tax on the income of corporations to 20 percent.
short_title: Restoring America's Competitiveness in Enterprise (RACE) Act of 2011

summary.text: Restoring America's Competitiveness in Enterprise (RACE) Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the maximum income tax rate on corporations, including personal service corporations, to 20% of taxable income over $50,000.

titles.title: Restoring America's Competitiveness in Enterprise (RACE) Act of 2011
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the maximum rate of tax on the income of corporations to 20 percent.
